root.name: A Vampyre Story: Year 1
root.description: A prequel to the adventure game A Vampyre Story, Year 1 will be an episodic point and click game which will be initially released for the iPad and then later to PCs. Â The game will allow you to furthur explore Castle Warg and Draxsylvania using the protagonists from the original game, vampire Mona and Froderick the bat,.
